BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Frederick Bland to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment to the Landmarks Preservation Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 3020 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Joan Gerner to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the Landmarks Preservation Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 3020 of the City Charter.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
